name: TURBO LAZER PIG
description:
NEO 1985 THE CITY OF FARMOPULUS IS IN CHAOS AFTER CYBER WOLF MURDERED MAYOR MCDONALD,THE ANIMALS OF THE CITY ARE AFRAID AND ARE FORCED TO LIVE UNDER CYBER WOLF'S RULES,UNTIL PROFESSOR SLAUGHTER CONSTRUCTED A CYBORG FROM A DEAD PIG NAMED OSCAR EQUIPPED WITH SPEED AND A BUILT IN LAZER GUN HE IS CERTAIN THAT CYBER WOLF'S REIGN WOULD END.

THANKS FOR PLAYING!!! YOUR DONATIONS ARE APPRECIATED :-)

MALIK BRUNO (FEEMSOFT)

CONTROLS: UP,DOWN,LEFT,RIGHT ON KEYBORD

X IS TO JUMP,Z IS TO SHOOT,ESC IS TO PAUSE

SPACE IS TO SKIP INTRO

NOTE:PRESS SPACE AT FEEMSOFT SCREEN TO START GAME :-)
